text: Rodrigo Abreu de Sá Vilela (born 15 March 1995) is a Portuguese professional footballer who plays as a winger for Cherno More Varna in the Bulgarian First League. ==Club career== An academy graduate of Louletano, Vilela made his senior debut for the club at the age of 17 in December 2012. In June 2018, Vilela joined Académica de Coimbra. He made his LigaPro debut on 19 May 2019 in a game against Varzim. In September 2020, Vilela signed a contract with Bulgarian club Cherno More Varna. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Portuguese footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:LigaPro players Category:Portuguese Second Division players Category:First Professional Football League (Bulgaria) players Category:Louletano D.C. players Category:Associação Académica de Coimbra – O.A.F. players Category:S.C.U. title: Rodrigo Vilela
